name: fitness_tracker_server
description: *** ### A mock fitness tracker app | By DeJuan Deal  #### [Github](https://github.com/dealhouse) | [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/dejuan-deal-242bn/) ***  ### ***Description*** #### **This project was made to allow the user to store and track the information necessary to reach their fitness and weight goals.** *** ### ***Technologies*** #### [Trello](https://trello.com/b/z03vPA02/project-4) #### [ERD](https://app.diagrams.net/#G1ELeUA7sF-_KZsKBCKio6RmO_niSHBPuh) #### [Component Hierarchy](https://app.diagrams.net/#G1D4gm9Sq99aNtWsRe7dFpU9MfDR0TK-4B) #### [Figma](https://www.figma.com/file/ArGkV5fNdoGLm1edJUjm8L/Project-4?node-id=0%3A1)
